snippet: Have you heard a little buzzing in your ear while out on the patio or in the backyard? It seems that everyone agrees that this summer is going to be a bad one for mosquitoes in the Northeast.
abstract: Editorial warns that the Northeast is likely to be plagued by an especially high mosquito population during the summer months.
lead_paragraph: Have you heard a little buzzing in your ear while out on the patio or in the backyard? It seems that everyone agrees that this summer is going to be a bad one for mosquitoes in the Northeast.
